suggest.amasty\/module-product-option-templates-: Install product-option-templates-mftf-2 module to be able to run Product Option Templates MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
Install product-option-templates-mftf-3 module to be able to run Product Option Templates MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
suggest.amasty\/product-option-templates-graphql: Install product-option-templates-graphql module to activate Graphql and Product Option Templates integration.
